privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: izan.io privacy policy - Learn how your personal data is collected, used, and protected.
privacy.intro: At izan.io ('we', 'us'), we respect your privacy. This policy describes how your personal data is collected, used, and protected when you use the izan.io web application ('Service').

sections.dataWeStoreDesc: izan.io stores your API keys and chat history only in your browser (IndexedDB). This data is not sent to or stored on our servers.
sections.thirdPartyServicesDesc: We use Google Analytics, Google Ads and Microsoft Clarity to improve our service and display ads. These services may use cookies and collect browser data. Google: https://policies.google.com/privacy, Microsoft Clarity: https://privacy.microsoft.com/privacystatement
sections.cookiesDesc: Google Analytics, Google Ads and Microsoft Clarity use cookies for traffic analysis, ad personalization and behavioral analytics (session replay, heatmaps). You can manage your preferences via the cookie banner.
sections.gdprDesc: For users in the EU and California: You have the right to access, correct, delete, and port your personal data. Since your data is stored only in your browser, clearing browser data will delete it.
sections.childrenDesc: Our Service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13.
sections.changesDesc: We may update this policy. Changes will be posted on this page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: izan.io terms of service - Rules you must follow when using our service.
terms.intro: Use of the izan.io ('Service') constitutes acceptance of these Terms of Service.

sections.acceptanceDesc: By using the Service, you agree to these terms.
sections.useOfServiceDesc: You must use the Service in compliance with applicable laws. You are responsible for keeping your API keys secure.
sections.disclaimerDesc: The Service is provided 'as is'. Accuracy of AI responses is not guaranteed.
sections.terminationDesc: We may terminate your access to the Service at any time.
